name: Monster Blocks Theme Song by MC Faceman

metadata.name: Monster Blocks Theme Song
metadata.description:
Animation by Gossip Goblin.  
Based on the innovative 2021 art collection "Monster Blocks" by Gossip Goblin.  
Song written, recorded, and mixed by MC Faceman. 
Beat by Clever Neph.  
Check out Monster Blocks at https://opensea.io/collection/monster-blocks

Lyrics:  
Monster Blocks

yuuuhhhhh

[Verse1]

_It all starts at the base bricks  
I got a Bison, a Martian, and Bodacious Twins

This no Noah's ark can't float with this  
We rise above in towers made with monster giblets

Like Orange Stern Fists and Skeletal Wings,  
Better to bring my Purple Tentacle things

_And that's my base flourish, it's gonna take courage  
You're gonna need Cool Hands to tackle Green Serpents

_You seem nervous, you don't get the purpose  
Find meaning in a useless machine purchase

The verses I'm dispersin' scatter Unsightly Vermin  
Shh they might've heard us, the eavesdroppers are lurkin'


[Chorus Full]

Ghosts and Goblins, spawn from rocks  
Coyotes and Shamans, claw and chop

You'd hope a lawman would draw and pop  
But hope and cops won't stop the Monster Blocks!

...Watch as they stack and lock,  
Frogs on Logs on a Cat in a Box

Can't ask us to stop we stack to the top  
Sorry pops, we're up to our Eyeballs in Monster Blocks!

...Watch Marbled Moths at the top  
Buggin' out is routine think outside the cyclone box

...Cytotoxins can drop you into shock  
_Meet me in the shop, ["why?"] we're buying Monster Blocks!


[Bridge 1]

..Straight from blocks to towers  
Vigilant we killin' it buildin' a lil city  
Collectin' a percentage of your contemplative Grizzlies

..You can't stop their powers  
Gossip fren we got it fren we lifted with the tikis  
Amphibians and pigs again just give em all the kiwis



[Verse 2]

Back to the middle brick, she a little thicc  
_A Squished Elephant of delish melanin

I keep my bricks elegant, I can't have a pelican  
_So I'll stick to my Petrified Owl  

Look at my tower, look what my Hounds do  
I got the power to flourish like Ominous Clouds do

_And that's at the top, I'm stackin' blocks  
With bear claws socks you can have ya Crocs


[Chorus -short]

Ghosts and Goblins, spawn from rocks  
Coyotes and Shamans, claw and chop

You'd hope a lawman would draw and pop  
But hope and cops won't stop the Monster Blocks!

...Watch as they stack and lock,  
Frogs on Logs on a Cat in a Box

Can't ask us to stop we stack to the top  
Sorry pops, we're up to our Eyeballs in Monster Blocks!



[Bridge 2]  
[*Riding the bass*]:  
Yuhh.. ya wanna stack a block and stand on the top now say yuhh  
Ya wanna rap a lot ya wanna hip to hop then say yuhh



[Chorus -short + Bridge 1 Singing]

[..Straight from blocks to towers]  
Ghosts and Goblins, spawn from rocks  
Coyotes and Shamans, claw and chop

You'd hope a lawman would draw and pop  
But hope and cops won't stop the Monster Blocks!

[..You can't stop their powers]  
...Watch as they stack and lock,  
Frogs on Logs on a Cat in a Box

Can't ask us to stop we stack to the top  
Sorry pops, we're up to our Eyeballs in Monster Blocks!


[Verse 3]

_Up to my Eyeballs, set up the tripod  
_My top brick, an Irritated Aardvark

Get the car started, I'm spittin' out a Real Spark  
A starved artist tryna get his meal started

I could eat a Chunky Shark, pinky promise..  
I'm droppin' like Comets, no one could top this

My synopsis is, there's no other option  
I'm coppin' Monster Blocks by Gossip Goblin!
